description: Used to add two input numbers

result.description: The result obtained after adding the 2 numbers
The result after multiplying the two numbers

description: Used to divide one number by another

result.description: The result after dividing the two numbers

description: Used to subtract one number from another

x.description: The 1st number to be subtracted from

description: Reads the specified first n records from a default csv file

count.description: The number of records to read

result.description: The data set extracted from the csv file

description: Draws a bar chart from the data set extracted from a csv file

df.description: The data set read from the csv file

column.description: Specifies the data column name in the default csv file

result.description: The path where the drawn bar chart is saved

column.description: Specifies the data column name in the default csv file

result.description: The path where the drawn line chart is saved
